trans-unit.source: Scales and rotates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 縮放和旋轉<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: TransformedBitmap supports only orthogonal transforms such as rotation transforms of 90° increments and scale transforms.
trans-unit.target: TransformedBitmap 支援只正交轉換，例如 90 度遞增旋轉轉換和縮放轉換。

trans-unit.source: Transforms that skew the image are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援扭曲影像的轉換。

trans-unit.source: TransformedBitmap implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: TransformedBitmap 實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: Property changes can only occur during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 在物件初始化期間只能發生在屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>發出信號，初始設定開始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A>來表示已完成初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: TransformedBitmap objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Transform%29> constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 使用建立的 TransformedBitmap 物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Transform%29>建構函式會自動初始化，而且屬性變更會被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Transform%29>

trans-unit.source: Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果映像儲存到檔案後套用轉換，則必須更新映像資料相關的中繼資料標記。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>使用這個建構函式所建立，您必須執行之間的屬性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap"></xref> class that has the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Source*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Transform*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap"></xref>類別具有指定<> *> 和<> *>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>使用這個建構函式建立的物件會自動初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Source*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Source*>新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap"></xref>執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.Source*>

trans-unit.target: BeginInit 之間必須進行屬性初始化和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A>呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>已初始化，屬性變更會被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>

trans-unit.target: 已經呼叫 BeginInit。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap"></xref> has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: -或- <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap"> </xref>已經初始化。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定點陣圖的來源。

trans-unit.source: You can chain a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> to another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by setting the Source property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> that you want.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將鏈結<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>到另一個<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>來源屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>至<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>您想。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Chain BitmapSource Objects Together](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example of chaining.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[如何︰ 鏈結 BitmapSource 物件一起](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)鏈結的範例。

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖來源。

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"></xref>, which specifies the scale or rotation of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"> </xref>，以指定的縮放或旋轉的點陣圖。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap> supports only orthogonal transforms such as rotation transforms of 90 increments and scale transforms.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>支援只正交轉換，例如旋轉轉換的 90 增量和縮放轉換。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Transforms that skew the image are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援扭曲影像的轉換。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Transform"> </xref>，以指定的縮放或旋轉的點陣圖。
